description:
Ken`ichi is steadily increasing his sales when Myarre and other beastfolk are lured into him by the smell of spices. He refuses to sell spices to them so he can stay off the radar of the spice syndicates, but he gives into pressure from the beastfolk and offers an alternative. Primula, the first daughter of the Mallow Trading Company appears before Ken`ichi.
Source: Crunchyroll
